thread.title: Hundreds join search for CA mudslide victims

title: Hundreds join search for CA mudslide victims
text:
Hundreds join search for CA mudslide victims 4:23pm EST - 01:05 
Days after mudslides swept through Southern California, hundreds of new rescuers have begun searching for survivors as the death toll rose to 20. Diane Hodges reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Days after mudslides swept through Southern California, hundreds of new rescuers have begun searching for survivors as the death toll rose to 20. Diane Hodges reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2B1atlf
